intro: (FLOKI): Short and sturdy, with strong limbs and a tool belt always at his side, radiating adventurous energy.
(WIF): Medium height, slim and balanced, with a signature hat and sharp, curious eyes.

(DOGE): Tall and steady, with soft, fluffy fur and a warm, reliable presence.

(SHIB): Medium height, well-proportioned and confident, with sharp, determined eyes.
